A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I saw TLJ during the opening weekend and was disappointed but the storyline that was presented. 

The movie felt like a cop out - from the crawler at the beginning\, to the sudden usage of tracking (never once seen in any of the 'canon' stories) to the mini death canon.

The movie had great potential\, but instead showcased a underwhelming story. So much potential wasted..
